column5: Ive been trying to post a pic, and its a "No Go"  Ive read Ricks  Help topic and had help from Beans [bless him   ] When I click on Upload and waiting and waiting I get;  Upload failed, file too large for space available.  The pic has been resized to 500 x 720. So,,,,,,,,,,,,   Help please, befor I lose what hair I have left

Just because you made if physically smaller doesn't mean the resolution still isn't way too high (I think 250KB is the limit here). When I downsize pictures I set the resolution/quality level to about mid scale. It takes 2 or 3 meg pictures and converts them to about 35kb.  I use paint shop pro. After you downsize your pictures pixel size and then you click "save as"...the box that comes up for where to save it to has "options" in the bottom corner. Click that and set your compression percentage lower. I'm using 60%.

open your picture in microsoft paint.... goto Stretch/Skew then set the ratios to around 50%, hit File save as and give it a name....then upload it. if it is still to big increase the ratio to say 35% etc   Good luck! Simple as it gets.   Gerritt.

Thanks for the responses Good People[and the PM Tom]  Too tired of it right now to try them,and you can see I posted a test pic "Old Maidand Friend" above.  So looks like I'm having trouble with that one pic.  Thanks again Friends!!!!
